skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The horses of Chaos live for battle and will choose to graze on bones over grass.

skillTree.name: Barded Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The already-fierce Chaos Steeds are often covered in heavy armour, making them even deadlier.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Horsemen of the Apocalypse
skillTree.description: They shall bring pestilence, war, famine, and death.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +2% for Chaos Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Chaos Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Knights units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Witness Me
skillTree.description: The Dark Gods will celebrate my blasphemous exploits.

skillTree.name: Magic Is Weakness
skillTree.description: The Blood God scorns magic. Only blood split through physical combat is acceptable to Khorne.

skillTree.name: Fill the Chalice
skillTree.description: Blood for the Blood God!

skillTree.name: Spoils
skillTree.description: What was yours is mine now.

ui_effects.description: ➕Entities cannot die while ability is active

skillTree.name: Grandfather’s Gift
skillTree.description: Grandfather Nurgle has a nauseating surprise in store for you...

skillTree.name: Pestilent Perseverance
skillTree.description: Nurgle’s chosen are supernaturally resilient.

skillTree.name: Plaguefather’s Protection
skillTree.description: The Lord of Pestilence loves each and every one of his children.

skillTree.name: Destruction
skillTree.description: We leave only burning houses behind.

ui_effects.description: ➕Unit is invulnerable to damage (does not apply to summoned units)

skillTree.name: Depraved Passions
skillTree.description: So many sensations to indulge, so little time…

skillTree.name: Delusions of Grandeur
skillTree.description: I am invincible! Nothing and no one can defeat me!

skillTree.name: Pain Is Pleasure
skillTree.description: We will enjoy this.

skillTree.name: Raiders
skillTree.description: Take it all!

skillTree.name: Favour of the Raven God
skillTree.description: Tzeentch’s gifts are yours to command!

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -5
	(enemy local province)

skillTree.name: Deplorably Degenerate
skillTree.description: Immorality is subjective.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +1%
	(enemy armies in region)

Vigour loss reduction: +3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Vigour loss reduction: +5%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Enact True Change
skillTree.description: The Great Schemer brings ruin to all.

effects.description:
Armour: -1 for all units
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour: -2 for all units
	(enemy armies in region)

Armour: -4 for all units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Tzeentch's Many Glories
skillTree.description: Just as planned.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires of Tzeentch grants regeneration and weakness to fire upon an enemy unit
➕ Fires 10 projectiles each dealing 50 100 damage and 10 30 explosion damage (6m)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

backgroundSkills.name: Infernal Dominance
backgroundSkills.description: "Mine desire is all, mortal wretch!"

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Power!
backgroundSkills.description: I feel daemonic power within me!

backgroundSkills.name: Lord of the Horde
backgroundSkills.description: Give own power to others... Not very wise.

backgroundSkills.name: Twisted Servants
backgroundSkills.description: Spawns gather around him and hear his commands.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Chaos Trolls
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Trolls are highly honoured in the eyes of the Changer of the Ways, for rarely does any creature combine mutation with such size, power, and sheer vitality.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +25% for Chaos Troll units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -5% for Chaos Troll units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Warriors of the Gods
backgroundSkills.description: Physically powerful, armed and armoured with both steel and sorcery, filled with evil intent. Are they even Human?

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Warrior units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tamer of Giants
backgroundSkills.description: Chaos Giants are instinctively drawn to those who bear the favour of the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +20% for Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: No rest, only blood!
backgroundSkills.description: The blood of our enemies lies here...

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen are Here!
backgroundSkills.description: Chosen wont serve this little worm, step aside!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chosen units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Just War!
backgroundSkills.description: The Chaos Gods look on us and smile, there is only war!

backgroundSkills.name: Leader of Forsaken
backgroundSkills.description: Forsaken by the Gods, now, they fight only out of a dark, unnatural hunger and madness.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Forsaken units
	(all units in army)
